ui.server connect error: Sorry, could not connect to server. Please try again later.

form.player name taken: Please choose another name, a player with the same name is already in the game.
form.access code: Sorry, your game access code is invalid.
form.player access code: Sorry, your player access code is invalid.
form.game room locked: Sorry, you can't join this game as the host has locked the room.
form.game already started: Sorry, you can't join a game after it has already started.

validation.start game wrong player number: The number of players in this game (__playercount__) doesn't match the number of roles included (__rolecount__).

label.names in group are random: (Names mentioned in a group are in random order.)
label.view your info below: Please view your info in the boxes below.
label.names players choices submitted: Players who have submitted choices so far
label.names players choices not submitted: Players who have not submitted choices
label.number choices submitted: Number of submitted choices so far
label.may resubmit choice: You may resubmit your choice to override your last selection.

dialog.host close window: As you are the game host, please manually leave the game first to avoid causing problems for the other users.
dialog.player close window: If you want to leave the game, please press the 'Leave Game' button first. Otherwise, you will remain in the game, just open another window in the same browser to resume.
dialog.player leave game: Are you sure you want to leave?
dialog.transfer host: Are you sure you want to make %s the new game host?
dialog.remove player: Are you sure you want to remove %s from the game?
dialog.swap player roles: Are you sure you want to swap the roles of players __player1__ and __player2__?
dialog.peek player role: Are you sure you want to peek at the role of player %s?
dialog.share box info: Are you sure you want to display this info to the other players?
dialog.show game log: Are you sure you want to show the game log?

event.new voting round: New voting round: please cast your vote:
event.reset voting round: The current voting round has been reset. Please cast your vote:
event.game ended: The game has ended. Here is the original role list:
